    Admin Configuration

    Streams can be managed below through the links to the Restreamer server. New streams cannot be created here, for that you must contact the admin

    You must ensure that the stream is started and is listening.
    If you see the (Error: Your stream wasn’t accessible. …. Operation not permitted) the system is functioning. Send some stream there and it will work

    Custom Feed

    Use this feed for custom mixed events using some software like OBS to add content.

    James Custom livestreams

    View live streams mixed with other sources.

    Watch configure stream

    Setup

    Each stream uses a seprate port to communicate with the video signal stream. Use the configuration details from below to connect the camera system to the server to stream.

    Livestream Stream Config Link Player Link Live Image Link stream link
